remarks: The domain of a singleton of an ordered pair is the singleton of the first member.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jan-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
statement:
dmsnop.1 $e |- B e. _V $.
dmsnop $p |- dom { <. A , B >. } = { A } $.
